description: Quick OverviewA perfect companion for your Samsung Galaxy Tab (Please note the incompatibilities above!!! Sprint tab requires upgrade to Android 2.3 Gingerbread): intelligent and innovative wireless Bluetooth QWERTY Keyboard+stylish and decent folding protective synthetic leather case.A similar product is available for the new 10" galaxy tab. Search for ASIN B005F0X6Z6Product DescriptionFeatures:Wireless Bluetooth QWERTY Keyboard & folding protective leather case with standIntelligent and simple connection with wireless operation distance up to 10mSpecial keys for one touch access to a variety of applications: return to home screen, return to previous, options key, telephone, lock the touch screen, search key, adjust the device's volume etcEnergy-saving keyboard sleep modeWith LED indicatorsWaterproof and dustproof designQuiet and comfortable keystrokesBuilt-in high capacity lithium rechargeable battery which can last for approximately 45 hours per chargeLightweight, compact, easy to carry and handleDecent and stylish folding protective leather case with stand make your Galaxy Tab use, view and carry more enjoyableSpecifications:Suitable for: Samsung Galaxy TabBluetooth version: 2.0Operation distance: Up to 10mOperation voltage: 3.0-5.0VLithium battery capacity: 450mAWorking current: <5.0mAStanding current: 2.5mACharging current: Over 100mAStanding time: 60 daysCharging time: 4-4.5 hoursLithium battery span: 3 yearsKey life: 5 million strokesMaterial: Silicon keyboard; synthetic leather caseProduct dimensions: 220x140x32mmProduct weight: 331gPackage Contents:1 Bluetooth Keyboard Case1 USB Cable1 User Manual
title: eWonder(R) Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard Case for 7" Samsung Galaxy Tab (Black, Not compatible with WIFI Only and US Cellular)
